data.text: «Yakɔsi, i xa xili ti i xui itexi ra.
Gbɛsɛnxɔnnɛya xaxilitare faxama nɛ,
N bara xaxilitare nde to,
‹Mali birin xa ba a xa die yi ra, kiiti xa kana e ra,
Kaamɛtɔɛe xa a xa xɛ don,
Tɔɔrɛ nun ɲaxankatɛ fama nɛ.
Adamadi tɔɔrɔma nɛ a xa duniɲɛigiri kui.
Xa n tan nan a ra nu, n Alatala nan maxandima,
A kaabanakoe rabama,
A tunɛ ragoro bɔxi ma,
A tɔɔrɔmixi xa fe itema,
A mixi kɔɔtaxi xa fe xun nakanama,
A mixi madaxui suxuma gantanyi ra,
E xa yanyi findima e bɛ dimi ra,
Alatala tɔɔrɔmixi ratangama wɔyɛn xɔrɔxɔɛ ma,
Xaxili tide luma nɛ tɔɔrɔmixi bɛ.
Ɲɛlɛxinyi na adama bɛ Ala naxan xuruma.
barima a fi naxan sama mixi ma,
A mu tondima i ratangade tɔɔrɛ ma,
Kaamɛ na sin bɔxi ma, a i ratangama nɛ faxɛ ma,
A i ratangama nɛ wɔyɛn ɲaaxi ma,
I mu gaaxuma kaamɛ ya ra,
barima saatɛ luma nɛ i nun duniɲa kui isee tagi,
Bɔɲɛsa luma nɛ i xɔnyi,
I xa die wuyama nɛ,
I mu gaburi lima, i xa simaya mu kamalixi,
Muxu bara yi nɔndi kolon,
